document_data.name: Spirit Mask
document_data.mainbody: '''''Spirit mask''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] used only by [[shaman]]s devoted to [[Ubtao]] called [[spiritlord]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the spiritlord to entwine their spirit essence with that of a major or minor spirit. The spell diverted [[divination]] spells targeted on the caster to the entwined spirit for the spell's duration, allowing the caster to misdirect any such intrusion for information.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s the spiritlord's holy symbol to cast.
